description: Publish videos, photos, and text to all your social channels from one place. Schedule and manage posts at scale with background processing and easy status tracking. Track performance with unified analytics and streamline page and profile management.

uploadPostApiKey.description: The API key for the Upload-Post service. Get your API key from https://upload-post.com/dashboard

capabilities.name: upload_video
capabilities.description:
Upload a video to social media platforms (TikTok, Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube, Facebook, X/Twitter, Threads, Pinterest).
    Supports scheduling and async uploads.

    Args:
        user: User identifier
        platforms: List of platforms (tiktok, instagram, linkedin, youtube, facebook, x, threads, pinterest)
        video_url: URL of the video to upload
        title: Default title for the video
        description: Description/caption for the video
        scheduled_date: ISO-8601 date for scheduling (optional)
        async_upload: Process in background (default: false)
        platform_specific: Platform-specific parameters (tiktok_title, instagram_title, etc.)

capabilities.name: upload_photo
capabilities.description:
Upload photos to social media platforms (Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, Facebook, X/Twitter, Threads, Pinterest).
    Supports multiple photos and scheduling.

    Args:
        user: User identifier
        platforms: List of platforms (instagram, tiktok, linkedin, facebook, x, threads, pinterest)
        photo_urls: List of photo URLs to upload
        title: Default title for the photos
        caption: Caption/description for the photos
        scheduled_date: ISO-8601 date for scheduling (optional)
        async_upload: Process in background (default: false)
        platform_specific: Platform-specific parameters (facebook_page_id, pinterest_board_id, etc.)

capabilities.name: upload_text
capabilities.description:
Upload text-only posts to social media platforms (X/Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, Threads, Reddit).
    Automatically creates threads for long text.

    Args:
        user: User identifier
        platforms: List of platforms (x, linkedin, facebook, threads, reddit)
        title: Text content for the post
        scheduled_date: ISO-8601 date for scheduling (optional)
        async_upload: Process in background (default: false)
        platform_specific: Platform-specific parameters (facebook_page_id, subreddit, etc.)

capabilities.name: get_upload_status
capabilities.description:
Check the status of an asynchronous upload using the request_id.

    Args:
        request_id: Request ID from async upload

capabilities.name: get_upload_history
capabilities.description:
Retrieve paginated history of past uploads across all platforms.

    Args:
        page: Page number (default: 1)
        limit: Page size: 10, 20, 50, or 100 (default: 10)

capabilities.name: get_analytics
capabilities.description:
Get analytics data for a user profile across social media platforms.

    Args:
        profile_username: Username of the profile
        platforms: Comma-separated platforms (instagram,linkedin,facebook,x)

capabilities.name: get_facebook_pages
capabilities.description:
Get list of Facebook pages accessible through connected accounts.

    Args:
        profile: Optional profile username to filter pages

capabilities.name: get_linkedin_pages
capabilities.description:
Get list of LinkedIn company pages associated with connected accounts.

    Args:
        profile: Optional profile username to filter pages

capabilities.name: get_pinterest_boards
capabilities.description:
Get list of Pinterest boards from connected accounts.

    Args:
        profile: Optional profile username to filter boards

capabilities.name: list_scheduled_posts
capabilities.description: List all scheduled posts for the authenticated user.

capabilities.name: cancel_scheduled_post
capabilities.description:
Cancel a scheduled post by its job ID.

    Args:
        job_id: Job ID of the scheduled post

capabilities.name: create_user_profile
capabilities.description:
Create a new user profile for platform integration.

    Args:
        username: Unique identifier for the user

capabilities.name: get_user_profiles
capabilities.description: Get all user profiles created under your API key.

capabilities.name: delete_user_profile
capabilities.description:
Delete a user profile and its associated data.

    Args:
        username: Username of the profile to delete

capabilities.name: generate_jwt
capabilities.description:
Generate a JWT URL for social account linking.

    Args:
        username: Username to generate JWT for
        redirect_url: URL to redirect after linking (optional)
